name: IndyPress Events
author: boyska, paskao

sections.description:
Features

  • Add Event UI
  • datetime start/end
  • location
  • Widget SEO-optimized using “calendar” microformat
  • Customizable permalink structure (search engines will like this!)

Open Publish form features

If you use Indypress, there are special “inputs” for it
sections.changelog:
0.2.1

  • fix 0.2, it was not really adding anything

0.2

  • add event calendar widget: the typical 7 columns x 4 rows widget, with jQuery bounties included

short_description: Indypress Events is a plugin which creates and manages a post_type suitable for event, with start/end, location, SEO optimization, dedicated widget an …
